title: veTri tarum vaDivEl (another version)
sahitya:
veTri tarum vaDivEl irukkaiyil ingu shaTrum kavalaippaDAdE manamE


anupallavi

  uTra tuNai umai bAlan unakkirukka maTravai yAvumE magizhvuDan varum enrum


caraNam    OrAru mukhamuDan IrAru karamuDan pArengum paraviDum paramporuLE avan
vErArum illaiyE vEdattin ellaiyE vArAdu tollaiyE vandanai seivAyE
